What's the easiest way to do speciation visualization
without writing a lot of code?  I'm using Ken's
original source, but in a cross-platform way... so I
can't use the GTK stuff.  I could modify it to use a
different image i/o library, but that might take a
while.

I noticed a good speciation picture in the Yahoo group
photos section.  How was that generated?

Thanks.

Tyler
